faq.question: What is Xentro?
faq.answer: Xentro is a web3 financial platform designed to offer innovative financial solutions through decentralized technologies, enhancing security and control for users.

faq.question: How does Xentro ensure the security of my funds?
faq.answer: We utilize cutting-edge blockchain technology and smart contract protocols to ensure the highest level of security and transparency for your transactions and assets.

faq.question: What does non-custodial management mean for my assets?
faq.answer: Non-custodial management means that you retain full control of your assets without relying on intermediaries. Our platform ensures you have direct access to and control over your funds at all times.

faq.question: Do I need prior experience with blockchain to use Xentro?
faq.answer: No prior experience is necessary. Our user-friendly interface and educational resources are designed to help both beginners and experienced users navigate the platform with ease.

faq.question: What types of financial services are available on Xentro?
faq.answer: Xentro offers a range of services including decentralized lending and borrowing, automated investment strategies, and comprehensive financial analytics.

faq.question: What kind of analytics does Xentro offer?
faq.answer: Xentro provides advanced financial analytics that offer real-time insights into your financial activities, helping you track performance, identify trends, and make informed decisions.

faq.question: How can I get support if I encounter any issues?
faq.answer: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any issues. You can reach out via our support portal or contact us directly through email or chat.
